verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H7919>considereth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> him, and keep him <S%H2421>alive<s%>; and he shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and thou wilt not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> him upon the <S%H6210>bed<s%> of <S%H1741>languishing<s%>: thou wilt <S%H2015>make<s%> all his <S%H4904>bed<s%> in his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me: <S%H7495>heal<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; for I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee.
Mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> of me, When shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>?

And if he <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> me, he <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>: his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to itself; when he <S%H3318>goeth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, he <S%H1696>telleth<s%> it.
All that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against me: against me do they <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
An <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease<s%>, say they, cleaveth <S%H3332>fast<s%> unto him: and now that he <S%H7901>lieth<s%> he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>.

Yea, mine own <S%H7965>familiar<s%> <S%H376>friend<s%>, in whom I <S%H982>trusted<s%>, which did <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, hath lifted <S%H1431>up<s%> his <S%H6119>heel<s%> against me.
But thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, and raise me <S%H6965>up<s%>, that I may <S%H7999>requite<s%> them.
By this I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou <S%H2654>favourest<s%> me, because mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> doth not <S%H7321>triumph<s%> over me.
And as for me, thou <S%H8551>upholdest<s%> me in mine <S%H8537>integrity<s%>, and <S%H5324>settest<s%> me before thy <S%H6440>face<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>, and to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
